overview: Fans of Adult Superstar Alektra Blue and critically acclaimed director Van Styles, will rejoice - as two of the biggest names in XXX join forces and deliver a hardcore day in the life masterpiece. A perfect contradiction of style, as Blue delivers a feverish sexual energy - while Styles shoots witha discrete, subtle approach. The result? An All-Sex XXX Classic!
title: Alektra Blue: In Another Light
